entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.31.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.31.0

Highlights

[management] Setup key improvements #2775 - We added support to setup-key deletion, allowing account cleanup of revoked or expired keys. - The max expiration time was removed, allowing users to define any date for key expiration. - Setup-keys are now stored as hashs, improving security for systems.

Because of a database migration where the setup-keys are being hashed, a downgrade is no longer possible without restoring a backup. So, testing and making sure a backup is done before upgrading is highly recommended. See backup docs here: https://docs.netbird.io/selfhosted/selfhosted-guide#backup

Improvements

  • [client] Make native firewall init fail firewall creation #2784
  • [misc] Update Zitadel from v2.54.10 to v2.64.1 #2793
  • [client] allow relay leader on iOS #2795
  • [management] remove network map diff calculations #2820
  • [management] Add DB access duration to logs for context cancel #2781
  • [client] Log windows panics #2829

Bug fixes

  • [client] Ignore route rules with no sources instead of erroring out #2786
  • [client] Fix multiple peer name filtering in netbird status command #2798
  • [client] Fix the broken dependency gvisor.dev/gvisor #2789
  • [management] Fix peer meta isEqual #2807
  • [client] Nil check on ICE remote conn #2806
  • [client] Allocate new buffer for every package #2823
  • [client] Fix unused servers cleanup #2826
  • [client] Remove legacy forwarding rules in userspace mode #2782

New Contributors

  • @Codixer made their first contribution in #2793
  • @mgarces made their first contribution in #2798
  • @milantracy made their first contribution in #2789

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.30.3...v0.31.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.32.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.32.0

Highlights

This release fixes an issue with the client's state manager that could cause a deadlock on a system with high load or slower system operations like adding routes or configuring network interfaces. This could affect the recovery from sleep, causing unwanted client state.

What's Changed

  • [management] Refactor setup key to use store methods by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2861
  • [management] Add more logs to the peer update processes by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2881
  • [client] Improve state write timeout and abort work early on timeout by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2882
  • [relay-server] Always close ws conn when work thread exit by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2879
  • [client] Update route calculation tests by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2884
  • [client] Handle panic on nil wg interface by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2891
  • [management] Fix limited peer view groups by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2894
  • [client/management] add peer lock to peer meta update and fix isEqual func by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2840
  • [management] Limit the setup-key update operation by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2841
  • [management] Refactor group to use store methods by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2867
  • [management] Fix the Inactivity Expiration problem. by @ismail0234 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2865
  • [client] Fix state manager race conditions by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2890
  • [client] Move state updates outside the refcounter by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2897
  • [client] Fix error state race on mgmt connection error by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2892

New Contributors

  • @ismail0234 made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.31.1...v0.32.0
